attributes.action: Have a fleet of HGV's on UK's motorways transporting motorcycles and riders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The fleet of HGV's with trailers would consist of the trailers being fixed with rollers.  The motorbike will be placed on the rollers, so the bike rider can travel in safety at low speed but still get the feeling of travel.

This would be economical for the environment and pleasurable for the motorbike rider.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
